ekpmeasure.control.instruments.keithley2400 package¶

Submodules¶

ekpmeasure.control.instruments.keithley2400.main module¶

ekpmeasure.control.instruments.keithley2400.main.config_measure_resistance(k2400, nplc=1, voltage=21.0, auto_range=True)¶

Configures the measurement of resistance. (Courtesy of pymeasure, see link below) :param k2400: Keithley 2400 :type k2400: pyvisa.instrument :param nplc: Number of power line cycles (NPLC) from 0.01 to 10 :type nplc: float or int :param voltage: Upper limit of voltage in Volts, from -210 V to 210 V :type voltage: float :param auto_range: Enables auto_range if True, else uses the set voltage :type auto_range: bool

https://github.com/pymeasure/pymeasure/blob/4249c3a06457d5e4c8a2ba595aea867e99f9e5b6/pymeasure/instruments/keithley/keithley2400.py

ekpmeasure.control.instruments.keithley2400.main.config_measure_voltage(k2400, nplc=1, voltage=21.0, auto_range=True)¶

Configures the measurement of voltage. (Courtesy of pymeasure, see link below) :param k2400: Keithley 2400 :type k2400: pyvisa.instrument :param nplc: Number of power line cycles (NPLC) from 0.01 to 10 :type nplc: float or int :param voltage: Upper limit of voltage in Volts, from -210 V to 210 V :type voltage: float :param auto_range: Enables auto_range if True, else uses the set voltage :type auto_range: bool
